name: user_traits
description: Manage user traits with a given action and user id, use this to access information you may have about anyone, this is only for specific users, not servers.

action.name: action
action.description: The action to perform (get_traits, add_traits, remove_trait, or reset_traits (will reset the entire list of traits for a given user))

username.name: user_id
username.description: The user id for which to manage traits

trait.name: trait
trait.description: The sentence to add, this should be as short as possible (required for add_traits action), or the trait ID if you are removing a trait
